params.amount: Amount of tokens to be burned
params.owner: Owner of the tokens being burned
params.tokenId: ID of the token to be burned

params.ticketId: The unique identifier of the ticket.

returns.showId: The unique identifier of the show associated with the ticket.

params.showId: The unique identifier of the show.
params.ticketId: The unique identifier of the ticket.

returns.price: The price paid for the ticket.
returns.tierIndex: The index of the ticket tier.

params.paymentToken: Address of the currency the ticket is priced in
params.tierIndex: Index of the ticket tier from which to purchase tickets

params.newDefaultURI: The new default URI for tickets.

params.newURI: New URI to set for the token
params.showId: ID of the show for which to set the URI
params.tokenId: Token ID for which to set the URI

burnTokens(uint256,uint256,address).notice: Burns a specific amount of tokens, removing them from circulation

getShowIdByTicketId(uint256).notice: Gets the associated show ID for a given ticket ID.

getTicketPricePaidAndTierIndex(bytes32,u.notice: Retrieves the price paid for a specific ticket and its tier index.

purchaseTickets(bytes32,uint256,uint256,.notice: Purchase multiple tickets for a specific show from a specific tier

setDefaultURIForShow(bytes32,string).notice: Sets the default URI for tickets related to a specific show.

setTokenURI(bytes32,uint256,string).notice: Sets the URI for a given token ID
